name: Alec Bradley - Select Corojo - Gordo
additionalNotes: Packaged in affordable bundles of 20, Select Corojo allows you to get a taste of boutique charm, at a price point that can land it in your everyday rotation. Up top is a high quality Corojo wrapper that coats a core of Nicaraguan grown long-fillers. They burn smooth and slow, providing flavors of coffee, natural tobacco, baking spice, and sweet earth.
